about_the_game:
If you enjoyed the art of Who We Are Now, then you may be interested in the art book! Take a look at each of the character sprites, backgrounds, and scenes that make up the game, along with sketches and concept art!

The art book is 68 pages of Who We Are Now's art, along with small explanations behind the design and concepts of the main characters.

content_descriptors.notes: There is some male nudity shown, but no sexual content.
